content.description: Rollstone Boulder is an iconic rock in the city of Fitchburg. The rock used to sit in a nearby quarry until it was moved. They blew the rock into chunks and reassembled it on Main Street. It even has its own Wikipedia page. en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rol…. The bouldah itself sits perched on granite blocks in the middle of Main Street. There’s some landscaping and shrubs to contend with. There’s also lots of traffic. The climbing seems decent besides some calcified footholds. There are no ticks or chalking of holds.
